name: saltfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
fish that has been preserved in salt: Ackee and saltfish is a Jamaican favourite. My boyfriend is from Trinidad and has been craving saltfish for a while now.
More examplesFewer examplesAdd the saltfish and other ingredients and cook for 5 mins.My Brazilian friends find it funny that we eat saltfish throughout the year. Having tried both saltfish and smoked haddock in this recipe, I prefer the latter.
